meanings.definition: A metal screen or guard placed in front of a fireplace to prevent sparks from escaping.
meanings.sent1: The fireguards in our fireplace keep the sparks inside.
meanings.sent2: My grandma always reminds us to close the fireguards before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the fireguards, thinking they were a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like fireguards, shielding her from distractions.
meanings.sent5: The fireguards glowed red as the fire crackled behind them.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that protects against fire.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters are the real fireguards in our community.
meanings.sent2: Having a fire extinguisher at home is a good fireguard measure.
meanings.sent3: The brave little dog thought he was the fireguards of the house, barking at any sign of danger.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was a warm fireguards in the cold world.
meanings.sent5: The ancient castle had stone walls like towering fireguards, protecting it from harm.
